body_html:
I built using the clang6 toolchain on ubuntu 16.

I modified the crosstool with the following versions (to what was installed by default on the machine)...
glibc to from 2.19 -> 2.23
libstdc++ from 4.8 -> 5.4.0

Unfortunately, I still hit the same error...

ImportError: /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libstdc++.so.6: version `GLIBCXX_3.4.20' not found

...when running this pip package on Ubuntu 14. Anything else I should try?
body_text:

I modified the crosstool with the following versions (to what was installed by default on the machine)...

ImportError: /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libstdc++.so.6: version `GLIBCXX_3.4.20' not found
...when running this pip package on Ubuntu 14. Anything else I should try?
body:
I built using the clang6 toolchain on ubuntu 16.

I modified the crosstool with the following versions (to what was installed by default on the machine)...
glibc to from 2.19 -> 2.23
libstdc++ from 4.8 -> 5.4.0

Unfortunately, I still hit the same error...

ImportError: /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libstdc++.so.6: version `GLIBCXX_3.4.20' not found

...when running this pip package on Ubuntu 14. Anything else I should try?
